description: Turn any 2.5" SATA hard drive into an external hard drive.  External hard drives are great for backing up information, moving files, and adding extra storage without opening your computer. They are ideal for storing music, movies, pictures, and all of your media.  Our USB 3.0 external hard drive enclosure is currently the fastest USB external drive solution on the market. It allows you to connect a hard drive externally at the same speed as an internal drive, even with SSD drives! The USB interface is backward compatible with all other USB versions, so this enclosure will work with any computer. Data Transfer Rate: Up to 5Gbps (USB 3.0), 480Mbps (USB 2.0)/ Supported HDD: 2.5" SATA / Max Capacity: 1TB
title: JacobsParts SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Hard Drive Enclosure for 2.5" SATA HDD
